rows.label: qst702603_msg0001
rows.name: Ah... I'm alive...!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0002
rows.name: Thanks for saving me.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm Parvi, an adventurer chasing
the dream of striking it rich
in this Dannagh Desert.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0004
rows.name:
...Well, it's not just a dream,
I have to make it a reality.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0006
rows.name:
I was hungry, so I ate some
red pollen orbs I found in
a green barrel nearby...

rows.label: qst702603_msg0007
rows.name:
My body got hot and I
drank a ton of water.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0008
rows.name:
My partner never came back,
and I ran out of food and
water, so I was about to die.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0010
rows.name: Why not return to the capital?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0011
rows.name: I don't want anyone to get ahead of me.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0012
rows.name:
There's a legend that gold is buried
under the sand of this desert.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0013
rows.name:
My partner and I are trying to
find it before anyone else.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0014
rows.name: ...Hey, Adel.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0015
rows.name: Is that story true?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0016
rows.name:
It's the kind of fairytale
you hear as a child.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0017
rows.name: So it's just a "legend"?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0018
rows.name:
Ah, you have the eyes
of a non-believer.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0019
rows.name: No, no, that's not it at all.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0020
rows.name:
We're not just digging up
this vast desert at random.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0021
rows.name:
We're using the power of
a machine to pinpoint the
location of the gold.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0022
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0023
rows.name: Is that your secret weapon, Parvi?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0024
rows.name: That's right! My partner salvaged it.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0025
rows.name:
The plan is to attach a part called
a Gravitonic Clutch to complete it,
and then it can collect gold.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0026
rows.name:
It doesn't look like such
an amazing device...

rows.label: qst702603_msg0027
rows.name: Parvi!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0028
rows.name: Sorry for the wait, mo!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0029
rows.name:
You're way too late! I was about
to turn into a dried-up husk.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0030
rows.name: Sorry, mo...

rows.label: qst702603_msg0031
rows.name: Oh? Could it be...

rows.label: qst702603_msg0032
rows.name:
Mo mo! It's the people who
helped me back then, mo?!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0033
rows.name: Fancy meeting you here.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0034
rows.name: Huh? You know each other?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0035
rows.name:
Yes, mo! They helped me a
ton when I was getting the
Gravitonic Clutch, mo!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0036
rows.name: I see... It's a small world...

rows.label: qst702603_msg0037
rows.name: Whoops, this is no time for idle chat.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0038
rows.name:
Hurry up and complete this
great gold-collecting machine.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0039
rows.name: Leave it to me, mo!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0040
rows.name: It's done, mo!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0041
rows.name: It works now?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0042
rows.name:
Once I flip the switch, it will move
all over the Dannagh Desert and collect
the gold buried in the sand, mo.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0043
rows.name: Probably...

rows.label: qst702603_msg0044
rows.name: That's amazing.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0045
rows.name: It's an interesting technology.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0046
rows.name:
Alright, Dudan, flip the switch
and let's carry our get-rich-quick
dreams on this thing.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0047
rows.name: Switching on, mo!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0048
rows.name: Oh, it's back.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0049
rows.name: Any results?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0051
rows.name: Dudan...

rows.label: qst702603_msg0052
rows.name:
There isn't a single
speck of gold, is there?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0053
rows.name: Mo mo...

rows.label: qst702603_msg0054
rows.name:
It seems my self-taught techniques
were not up to the task, mo.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0055
rows.name: Hey!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0056
rows.name:
I spent all my savings modifying
this great gold-collecting
machine, so get some results!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0057
rows.name:
At this rate... we have no choice but
to have an expert modify it, mo!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0058
rows.name:
Some weird inventor in the
capital, or anyone will do, mo!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0059
rows.name: He sounds desperate...

rows.label: qst702603_msg0060
rows.name:
Please! Dudan is useless
now, so please help me!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0061
rows.name:
I'm also curious if there's really
gold buried here, so I'll help.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0062
rows.name: Yes, I'm curious as well.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0063
rows.name:
Alright, let's go ask someone
who knows about machines.
